Check OpenVMS System Requirements [PREVIOUS] [TOP] [NEXT]

5.1 Check OpenVMS System Requirements

  • Save the Command Procedure to Check for OpenVMS System Requirements into a file named config_check.com..
  • Execute command procedure: @config_check (example of output below).
  • Compare output to OpenVMS DEC-Alpha Requirements requirements: 
    
Node    OS/Version   RAM Mb   Swap Mb   Motif       Multinet
CODA1   VMS 6.1      128      131       1.2-940307  3.4 Rev A
    Next: Command Procedure to Check System Requirements
